title: Amani Toomer Left Football and Found His Voice
itunes:title: Amani Toomer Left Football and Found His Voice
description:
Football, and the world, have changed a lot since Amani Toomer stopped playing. The former New York Giants and University of Michigan great weighs in from Denmark on the pending NFL season and the trickiness of non-bubbled pro football. He also talks to Jason, Michael and Mike about the gross inequalities built into college athletics and how social media has radically transformed what it means to be an athlete.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
